titleStmt.title: The Spanish tragedy, containing the lamentable murders of Horatio and Bellimperia: with the pitifull death of old Hieronimo. To the tune of Queene Dido..

notesStmt.note: Verse: "You that haue lost your former ioyes ..."
Item at reel A5:1[207a] has Solomons sacrifice (STC 22904) printed on verso.
Imperfect: copy at reel A5:1[207a] lacks "The second part. To the same tune."
Reproductions of originals in the British Library.
